org.jetlang.core
Interface Filter<T>

Type Parameters:
T - Type of message this filter is for
public interface Filter<T>

Interface to represent a boolean filter for messages

Method Summary
 boolean passes(T msg)
          Check to see whether the supplied message passes the filter
 

Method Detail

passes

boolean passes(T msg)
Check to see whether the supplied message passes the filter

Parameters:
msg - Message to check against filter
Returns:
True upon success, false otherwise.
